trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介绍

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> data source control represents data in an SQL relational database to data-bound controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>数据源控件表示数据绑定控件 SQL 关系数据库中的数据。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control in conjunction with a data-bound control to retrieve data from a relational database and to display, edit, and sort data on a Web page with little or no code.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>结合控件与数据绑定控件从关系数据库中检索数据并将显示、 编辑，并在具有很少或没有代码的 Web 页上的数据进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Data Connections
trans-unit.target: 数据连接

trans-unit.source: To connect to a database, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A> property to a valid connection string.
trans-unit.target: 若要连接到数据库，必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A>属性设置为有效的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> can support any SQL relational database that can be connected to using an ADO.NET provider, such as the `SqlClient`, `OleDb`, `Odbc`, or `OracleClient` provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>可以支持任何 SQL 关系数据库可以连接到使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，如`SqlClient`， `OleDb`， `Odbc`，或`OracleClient`提供程序。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to secure connection strings, see [How To: Secure Connection Strings when Using Data Source Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何保护连接字符串的信息，请参阅[How To： 安全连接字符串时使用数据源控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62)。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve data from an underlying database, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> property with an SQL query.
trans-unit.target: 若要从基础数据库中检索数据，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>用 SQL 查询的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the database that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> is associated with supports stored procedures, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> property to the name of a stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据库的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>关联支持存储过程，你可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>到存储过程的名称的属性。

trans-unit.source: The SQL query that you specify can also be a parameterized query.
trans-unit.target: 你指定的 SQL 查询也可以是参数化的查询。

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects that are associated with a parameterized query to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>与参数化查询到关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information about parameterized SQL queries and their syntax, see [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f).
trans-unit.target: 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和其语法的详细信息，请参阅[与用于筛选的数据源控件使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control retrieves data whenever the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件中检索数据时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: This method provides programmatic access to the method that is specified by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供以编程方式访问由指定的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method is automatically called by controls that are bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> when their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法将自动调用绑定到控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>时其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of a data-bound control, the control automatically binds to data from the data source, as required.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>数据绑定控件的属性，该控件自动将绑定到数据从数据源，根据需要。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `DataSourceID` property is the recommended method for binding an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control to a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 设置`DataSourceID`属性是绑定的建议的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>到数据绑定控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the `DataSource` property, but then you must explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以使用`DataSource`属性，但你必须显式调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>的数据绑定控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Some examples of data-bound controls that can use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用的数据绑定控件的一些示例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method programmatically at any time to retrieve data from the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>以编程方式在任何时候从基础数据库检索数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: In declarative and programmatic ASP.NET scenarios, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the data-bound control to the ID of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 在声明性和编程 ASP.NET 方案中，你可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>数据绑定控件的 id 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also assign an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> class to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以分配的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>类到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>数据绑定控件属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about binding data-bound control to data source controls, see [ASP.NET Data Access Options](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a5ff235e-397f-4bbe-9bfe-2720b6e7ab9d).
trans-unit.target: 有关将数据绑定控件绑定到数据源控件的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问选项](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a5ff235e-397f-4bbe-9bfe-2720b6e7ab9d)。

trans-unit.source: Performing Data Operations
trans-unit.target: 执行数据操作

trans-unit.source: Depending on the capabilities of the underlying database product and the configuration of the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> class, you can perform data operations, such as updates, inserts, and deletes.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于基础的数据库产品和的实例的配置的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>类，你可以执行数据操作，如更新、 插入和删除。

trans-unit.source: To perform these data operations, set the appropriate command text and any associated parameters for the operation that you want to perform.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行这些数据操作，请设置相应的命令文本和任何关联的参数为你想要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: For example, for an update operation, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A> property to an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure and add any required parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于更新操作，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A>到一个 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称的属性并添加到任何所需的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The update is performed when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A> method is called, either explicitly by your code or automatically by a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 执行更新时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>显式由你的代码或通过数据绑定控件自动调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The same general pattern is followed for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A> operations.
trans-unit.target: 都将执行相同的常规模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>操作。

trans-unit.source: The SQL queries and commands that you use in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> properties can be parameterized.
trans-unit.target: SQL 查询和命令中使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A>可以参数化的属性。

trans-unit.source: This means that the query or command can use placeholders instead of literal values and bind the placeholders to application or user-defined variables.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着查询或命令可以使用占位符，而不是文本值并将占位符绑定到应用程序或用户定义的变量。

trans-unit.source: You can bind parameters in SQL queries to Session variables, values that are passed on the query string for a Web Forms page, the property values of other server controls, and more.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将 SQL 查询中的参数绑定到会话变量，在 Web 窗体页的查询字符串传递的值、 其他服务器控件，以及更多的属性值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use parameters in SQL queries with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>, see [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f) and [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何在包含的 SQL 查询中使用参数的详细信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>，请参阅[与用于筛选的数据源控件使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f)和[使用参数与 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295).

trans-unit.source: By default, if one of the parameters is `null` when you execute a `Select` command, no data will be returned and no exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果其中一个参数是`null`执行时`Select`命令时，将返回任何数据，并会引发任何异常。

trans-unit.source: You can change this behavior by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CancelSelectOnNullParameter%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置来更改此行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CancelSelectOnNullParameter%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Data Provider
trans-unit.target: 数据提供程序

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control works with the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, but <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> is not Microsoft SQL Server–specific.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件与.NET Framework 数据提供程序适用于 SQL Server，但<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>不是 Microsoft SQL Server 特定。

trans-unit.source: You can connect the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control with any database product for which there is a managed ADO.NET provider.
trans-unit.target: 你可以连接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>托管的 ADO.NET 提供程序提供任何数据库产品使用的控件。

trans-unit.source: When used with the <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType> provider, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> can work with any OLE DB-compliant database.
trans-unit.target: 如果用于<xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType>提供程序，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>可以处理任何 OLE DB 兼容的数据库。

trans-unit.source: When used with the <xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType> provider, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> can be used with any ODBC driver and database, including IBM DB2, MySQL, and PostgreSQL.
trans-unit.target: 如果用于<xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType>提供程序，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>可以用于任何 ODBC 驱动程序和数据库，包括 IBM DB2、 MySQL 和 PostgreSQL。

trans-unit.source: When used with the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient?displayProperty=nameWithType> provider, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> can work with Oracle 8.1.7 databases and later.
trans-unit.target: 如果用于<xref:System.Data.OracleClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>提供程序， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> Oracle 8.1.7 数据库和更高版本可以工作。

trans-unit.source: The list of allowable providers is registered in the `DbProviderFactories` section of the configuration file, either in the Machine.config or Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 允许的提供程序的列表中未注册`DbProviderFactories`配置文件，请在 Machine.config 或 Web.config 文件中的部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Selecting Data Using the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[选择数据使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb)。

trans-unit.source: Caching
trans-unit.target: 缓存

trans-unit.source: If you display data on your page using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control, you can increase the performance of the page by using the data caching capabilities of the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 如果在使用你页上显示数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件，你可以通过使用数据缓存的数据源控件的功能提高页的性能。

trans-unit.source: Caching reduces the processing load on the database servers at the expense of memory on the Web server; in most cases, this is a good trade-off.
trans-unit.target: 缓存可减少在 Web 服务器; 上的内存为代价的数据库服务器上的处理负载在大多数情况下，这是一个良好的平衡。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> automatically caches data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.EnableCaching%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> property is set to the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>自动缓存数据时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.EnableCaching%2A>属性设置为`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>属性设置为在缓存中存储数据的缓存项将被丢弃之前的秒数。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> and an optional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SqlCacheDependency%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>和可选<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SqlCacheDependency%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: Additional Features
trans-unit.target: 其他功能

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> provides additional capabilities, as listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>提供其他功能，如以下表中列出。

trans-unit.target: 功能

trans-unit.source: Caching
trans-unit.target: 缓存

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet> value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.EnableCaching%2A> property to `true`, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> properties according to the caching behavior you want for your cached data.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet>值，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.EnableCaching%2A>属性`true`，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>根据缓存数据所需的缓存行为的属性。

trans-unit.source: Deleting
trans-unit.target: 正在删除

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> property to an SQL statement used to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A>到用于删除数据的 SQL 语句的属性。

trans-unit.source: This statement is typically parameterized.
trans-unit.target: 此语句通常参数化。

trans-unit.source: Filtering
trans-unit.target: 筛选

trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet>值。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property to a filtering expression used to filter the data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性用来筛选数据的筛选表达式时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.target: 当前支持的 not <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>，但是一些数据绑定控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>，支持分页设置时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet>值。

trans-unit.source: Data Source View
trans-unit.target: 数据源视图

trans-unit.source: As with all data source controls, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is associated with a data source view class.
trans-unit.target: 与所有数据源控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件所关联的数据源视图类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control has only one associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>, and it is always named `Table`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件仅有一个关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>，并且始终名为`Table`。

trans-unit.source: There is no visual rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control; it is implemented as a control so that you can create it declaratively and, optionally, to allow it to participate in state management.
trans-unit.target: 没有没有可视化呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件; 它作为实现控件，以便你可以创建它以声明方式和 （可选） 若要允许应用程序参与状态管理。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> does not support visual features, such as the ones that are provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.EnableTheming%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.SkinID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>不支持 visual 功能，例如那些由<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.EnableTheming%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.SkinID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 声明性语法

trans-unit.source: A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192424).
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192424)。

trans-unit.source: This section contains four code examples:
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含四个代码示例：

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to display data from SQL Server in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control using declarative syntax.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何显示中的 SQL Server 中的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制是通过使用声明性语法。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to display data from an ODBC-compliant database in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control using declarative syntax.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示如何显示从符合 ODBC 的数据库中的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制是通过使用声明性语法。

trans-unit.source: The third code example demonstrates how to display and update data in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 第三个代码示例演示如何显示和更新中的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The fourth code example demonstrates how to display and update data in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 第四个代码示例演示如何显示和更新中的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: These examples show how to use declarative syntax for data access.
trans-unit.target: 这些示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何通过使用代码而不标记访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control declaratively to retrieve data from SQL Server and display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件以声明方式从 SQL Server 中检索数据并将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control declaratively to retrieve data from an ODBC-compliant database and display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件以声明方式从符合 ODBC 的数据库中检索数据并将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A> property is the name of the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, which is <xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A>属性是用于 ODBC，这是.NET Framework 数据提供程序的名称<xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a common display and update scenario with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示常见的显示和更新方案中的使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: As with the previous examples, data from the Northwind database is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 如与上述示例中，从 Northwind 数据库的数据显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, because an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A> property is specified and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A> property is set to `true`, you can edit and update the records with no additional code.
trans-unit.target: 此外，因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A>指定属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A>属性设置为`true`，你可以编辑和任何其他代码使用更新记录。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically handles adding parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A> collection and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A> method when the **Update** button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动处理添加到参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A>集合并调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>方法时**更新**按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a common display and update scenario with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示常见的显示和更新方案中的使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control does not automatically add update parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A> collection nor call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A> method, so you must do so.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件不会自动添加到更新参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A>集合也不调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>方法，因此你必须这样做。

trans-unit.source: The update parameters are specified declaratively and you can add an event handler to perform the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A> operation when an event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 以声明方式指定更新参数，并且可以添加事件处理程序执行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>操作时将引发一个事件。

trans-unit.source: This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The connection string used to connect to the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 用于与基础数据库建立连接的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The SQL query used to retrieve data from the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 用于从基础数据库中检索数据的 SQL 查询。

trans-unit.source: If the SQL query is a parameterized SQL string, you might need to add <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter" /> objects to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果该 SQL 查询是参数化的 SQL 字符串，可能需要将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter" /> 对象添加到 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters" /> 集合中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> class with the specified connection string and Select command.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的连接字符串和 Select 命令初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax for `selectCommand` depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因为不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL 的语法`selectCommand`取决于当前 ADO.NET 提供程序正在使用中，由标识<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the provider is the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which is the default provider for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果该提供程序是<xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>，这是默认提供程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。

trans-unit.source: However, if the provider is set to the <xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果提供程序设置为<xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType>，则参数的占位符为`'?'`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295).
trans-unit.target: 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> value can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>该值可以是一个 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持存储的过程。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The example is unusual in that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is being used not on a Web Forms page, but in the implementation of a middle-tier object as a simple way for a business object to interact with a database.
trans-unit.target: 该示例很少将，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件用于不在 Web 窗体页中，而是中间层对象的实现中的业务对象的简单方法与数据库交互。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a connection string that is stored in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用存储在 Web.config 文件中的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>类。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data provider that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> uses.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 使用的数据提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: If no provider is set, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> uses the ADO.NET provider for Microsoft SQL Server, by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置任何提供程序，则在默认情况下，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 使用 Microsoft SQL Server 的 ADO.NET 提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The connection string used to connect to the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 用于与基础数据库建立连接的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The SQL query used to retrieve data from the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 用于从基础数据库中检索数据的 SQL 查询。

trans-unit.source: If the SQL query is a parameterized SQL string, you might need to add <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter" /> objects to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果该 SQL 查询是参数化的 SQL 字符串，可能需要将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter" /> 对象添加到 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters" /> 集合中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> class with the specified connection string and Select command.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的连接字符串和 Select 命令初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of `selectCommand` depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the `providerName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因为不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL 的语法`selectCommand`取决于当前 ADO.NET 提供程序正在使用中，由标识`providerName`参数。

trans-unit.source: If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the provider is <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which is the default provider for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果该提供程序是<xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>，这是默认提供程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。

trans-unit.source: However, if the provider is set to the <xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果提供程序设置为<xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType>，则参数的占位符为`'?'`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295).
trans-unit.target: 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>属性可以是一个 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持存储的过程。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the length of time, in seconds, that the data source control caches data that is retrieved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置以秒为单位的一段时间，它是数据源控件缓存 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> 方法所检索到的数据的时间。

trans-unit.source: The number of seconds that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> caches the results of a <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 缓存 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> 操作结果的秒数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The value cannot be negative.
trans-unit.target: 该值不能为负数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control supports data caching.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件支持数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: While data is cached, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 数据被缓存，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法从缓存而不是从基础数据库中检索数据。

trans-unit.source: When the cache expires, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again.
trans-unit.target: 在缓存过期，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法从基础数据库中，检索数据，然后再次缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control automatically caches data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.EnableCaching%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件将自动缓存数据时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.EnableCaching%2A>属性设置为`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>属性设置为一个值大于 0，指示在缓存中存储数据的缓存项之前的秒数将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0 指示无限期的缓存。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of the cache is determined by a combination of the duration and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 持续时间的组合来确定缓存的行为和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute> value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> caches data on the first data retrieval operation, holds it in memory for, at most, the amount of time that is specified by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute>值，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>缓存上的第一个数据检索操作的数据、 将其在内存中保留的最多，由指定的时间量<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The data might be released before the duration time, if the memory is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果所需的内存，则可能之前持续时间，发布数据。

trans-unit.source: The cache is then refreshed during the next operation.
trans-unit.target: 在下一步操作期间，然后刷新缓存。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Sliding> value, the data source control caches data on the first data retrieval operation, but resets the time window that it holds the cache for each subsequent operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Sliding>值，数据源控件在第一个数据检索操作上, 缓存数据，但将重置为每个后续操作的缓存的时间范围。

trans-unit.source: The cache expires, if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> value since the last <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: 缓存过期，如果一段时间，它等于没有任何活动<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>自上次操作后的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control can cache data only when it is in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet> mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件可以缓存数据，仅当它处于时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet>模式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataReader> value and caching is also enabled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataReader>值和缓存也被启用。

trans-unit.source: When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用的在 Microsoft Windows 身份验证的客户端模拟时，当第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。

trans-unit.source: If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。

trans-unit.source: The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data.
trans-unit.target: 不通过另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问数据检索的数据。

trans-unit.source: If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching.
trans-unit.target: 如果希望多个用户访问数据，并且你希望每个检索到的数据库的安全性配置验证的数据，不使用缓存。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, with data caching enabled.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中的 Northwind 数据库检索数据并将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件，启用数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> is set to 20 seconds and, because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute> value by default, users of this page will see fresh data every 20 seconds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>设置为 20 秒，因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute>值默认情况下，此页的用户将看到刷新的数据每隔 20 秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cache expiration behavior that, when combined with the duration, describes the behavior of the cache that the data source control uses.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置缓存的到期行为，该行为与持续时间组合在一起可以描述数据源控件所用缓存的行为。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control supports data caching.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件支持数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: While data is cached, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 数据被缓存，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法从缓存而不是从基础数据库中检索数据。

trans-unit.source: When the cache expires, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again.
trans-unit.target: 在缓存过期，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法从基础数据库中，检索数据，然后再次缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of the cache is determined by a combination of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 缓存的行为由的组合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>设置。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute> value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> caches data on the first data retrieval operation, holds it in memory for the amount of time that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> property, and then discards it after the time has lapsed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute>值，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>缓存上的第一个数据检索操作的数据、 将其保留在内存中保留指定的时间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>属性，然后再将其丢弃后的时间结束。

trans-unit.source: The cache is then refreshed during the next operation.
trans-unit.target: 在下一步操作期间，然后刷新缓存。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Sliding> value, the data source control caches data on the first data retrieval operation, but resets the time window that it holds the cache for each subsequent operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Sliding>值，数据源控件在第一个数据检索操作上, 缓存数据，但将重置为每个后续操作的缓存的时间范围。

trans-unit.source: The cache expires, if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> value since the last <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: 缓存过期，如果一段时间，它等于没有任何活动<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>自上次操作后的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control can cache data only when in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet> mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件可以缓存数据中的时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet>模式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataReader> value and caching is also enabled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataReader>值和缓存也被启用。

trans-unit.source: When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用的在 Microsoft Windows 身份验证的客户端模拟时，当第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。

trans-unit.source: If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。

trans-unit.source: The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data.
trans-unit.target: 不通过另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问数据检索的数据。

trans-unit.source: If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching.
trans-unit.target: 如果希望多个用户访问数据，并且你希望每个检索到的数据库的安全性配置验证的数据，不使用缓存。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, with data caching enabled.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中的 Northwind 数据库检索数据并将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件，启用数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Sliding> value, users will not see fresh data even though the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> value is 20 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Sliding>值，用户将看不保持数据即使<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>值为 20 秒。

trans-unit.source: The cached data is refreshed only if there is no activity on the page for more than 20 seconds since the last page load.
trans-unit.target: 只有在没有活动的页上自最后一个页面加载超过 20 秒刷新的缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a user-defined key dependency that is linked to all data cache objects that are created by the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个用户定义的键依赖项，该键依赖项链接到数据源控件创建的所有数据缓存对象。

trans-unit.source: All cache objects are explicitly expired when the key is expired.
trans-unit.target: 当键到期时，所有缓存对象都显式到期。

trans-unit.source: A key that identifies all cache objects created by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个键，它标识所有由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 创建的缓存对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control supports data caching.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件支持数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: While data is cached, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 数据被缓存，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法从缓存而不是从基础数据库中检索数据。

trans-unit.source: When the cache expires, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again.
trans-unit.target: 在缓存过期，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法从基础数据库中，检索数据，然后再次缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A> property to create a dependency between all cache entries that are created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control and the key.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A>要创建由创建的所有缓存项之间的依赖项属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件和密钥。

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically expire all the cache entries at any time by expiring the key.
trans-unit.target: 以编程方式，您可以通过使密钥过期随时终止所有缓存条目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control can cache data only when in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet> mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件可以缓存数据中的时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet>模式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataReader> value and caching is also enabled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataReader>值和缓存也被启用。

trans-unit.source: A unique cache entry is created for every combination of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 对每个组合都创建一个唯一的缓存条目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> controls can use the same cache entries in scenarios where the controls load the same data from the same underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件可以使用相同的缓存条目在方案中控件从相同的基础数据库加载相同的数据的位置。

trans-unit.source: When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用的在 Microsoft Windows 身份验证的客户端模拟时，当第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。

trans-unit.source: If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。

trans-unit.source: The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data.
trans-unit.target: 不通过另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问数据检索的数据。

trans-unit.source: If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching.
trans-unit.target: 如果希望多个用户访问数据，并且你希望每个检索到的数据库的安全性配置验证的数据，不使用缓存。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a data retrieval operation is canceled when any parameter that is contained in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters" /> collection evaluates to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters" /> 集合中包含的任何一个参数为 <see langword="null" /> 时，是否取消数据检索操作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a data retrieval operation is canceled when a parameter contained in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters" /> collection evaluated to <see langword="null" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters" /> 集合中包含的某个参数为 <see langword="true" /> 时将取消数据检索操作，则为 <see langword="null" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CancelSelectOnNullParameter%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CancelSelectOnNullParameter%2A>属性存储视图状态中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value indicating how the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> control performs updates and deletes when data in a row in the underlying database changes during the time of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置值，该值指示操作期间基础数据库中的一行数据更改时，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 控件如何执行更新和删除。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.OverwriteChanges" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.OverwriteChanges" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the `Update` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>属性确定的旧和新值的参数适用于`Update`方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the command that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> property returns a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object with the columns `Name` and `Number` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.OverwriteChanges> value, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the `Update` method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果该命令是指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>属性返回<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象包含列`Name`和`Number`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.OverwriteChanges>值，为创建参数`Name`和`Number`为`Update`方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues> value, parameters are created for `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Number`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues>值，参数为创建`Name`， `Number`， `original_Name`，和`original_Number`。

trans-unit.source: (The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A> property.) The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control then determines if the `Update` method that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A> property has parameters that match.
trans-unit.target: (取决于原始值的参数的确切名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>属性。)<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件然后确定如果`Update`中指定的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A>属性具有匹配的参数。

trans-unit.source: Concurrency control is a technique that data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data.
trans-unit.target: 并发控制是一种数据存储区使用来控制如何读取和更改存储区中，在访问和操作同一数据多个客户端数据的技术。

trans-unit.source: For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data, and presents it to a different user.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一台客户端读取数据，并将其呈现给用户，而另一个客户端读取同一数据，并将其呈现给其他用户。

trans-unit.source: If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, some unexpected result might occur, because both clients might update different values for the same data.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个用户更新的数据，并将其提交至数据存储，则可能会发生某种意外的结果，因为两个客户端可能会更新相同数据的不同值。

trans-unit.source: This is considered a conflict.
trans-unit.target: 这是被视为冲突。

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues> value, your `Update` method can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them, as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues>值，你`Update`方法然后可以将比较到原始的数据源，以检测冲突，并根据需要处理它们，新旧值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>属性委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ADO.NET provider–specific connection string that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> control uses to connect to an underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置特定于 ADO.NET 提供程序的连接字符串，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 控件使用该字符串连接基础数据库。

trans-unit.source: A .NET Framework data provider–specific string that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> uses to connect to the SQL database that it represents.
trans-unit.target: 一个特定于 .NET Framework 数据提供程序的字符串，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 使用该字符串连接它所表示的 SQL 数据库。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control can be used with a variety of ADO.NET providers and the syntax of the connection string that is used to connect to an underlying data source is specific to the provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件可与各种 ADO.NET 提供程序和用于连接到基础数据源的连接字符串的语法是特定于提供程序。

trans-unit.source: When you configure a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control, you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A> property to the type of database (the default is <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>), and you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A> property to a connection string that includes information that is required in order to connect to the database.
trans-unit.target: 当你配置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件，则设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A>到的数据库的类型的属性 (默认值是<xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>)，你将设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A>为连接字符串，其中包含所需连接的信息的属性到数据库。

trans-unit.source: The contents of a connection string differ depending on what type of database the data source control is accessing.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串的内容不同，具体取决于哪种类型的数据库访问数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control requires a server name, database (catalog) name, and information about how to authenticate the user when connecting to a SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件要求服务器名称、 数据库 （目录） 名称和有关如何连接到 SQL Server 时，用户进行身份验证信息。

trans-unit.source: For information about the contents of connection strings, see the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> class, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property for the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> class, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property for the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection> class, or the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property for the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关的连接字符串的内容的相关信息，请参阅<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>类，<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>类，<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.ConnectionString%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection>类，或<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.ConnectionString%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection>类。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.DataSourceChanged> event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control to rebind.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.DataSourceChanged>引发事件时，导致绑定到任何控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件重新绑定。

trans-unit.source: For information about storing a connection string, see [How To: Secure Connection Strings when Using Data Source Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62).
trans-unit.target: 有关存储连接字符串的信息，请参阅[How To： 安全连接字符串时使用数据源控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62)。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A> property to connect to a Microsoft SQL Server database and display the results of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A>属性来连接到 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库和显示的结果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates a more complex scenario, where a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is used to display and update data in a password-protected Microsoft Access database.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示的更复杂的方案，其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件用于显示和更新受密码保护 Microsoft Access 数据库中的数据。

trans-unit.source: In each case, the `connectionStrings` element of the Web.config file is shown first, followed by the ASP.NET page that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 在每个情况下， `connectionStrings` Web.config 文件的元素显示第一个，包含 ASP.NET 页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A> property to connect to a SQL Server database and display the results of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A>属性来连接到 SQL Server 数据库和显示的结果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a more complex scenario than the preceding code example, where a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is used to display and update data in a password-protected Access database.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的更复杂的方案，比前面的代码示例，其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件用于显示和更新受密码保护访问数据库中的数据。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> is used with Access, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Data.OleDb> provider, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A> property is set to an appropriate connection string for a UNC-shared Access database.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>用于访问，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Data.OleDb>提供程序，与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A>属性设置为适当的连接字符串为 UNC 共享访问数据库。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays orders with shipment dates.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将显示包含发货日期的订单。

trans-unit.source: You can update an order by checking the appropriate check box, and then clicking the **Update** button.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过检查相应的复选框，然后单击更新订单**更新**按钮。

trans-unit.source: This example includes a password in plain text only for illustration purposes.
trans-unit.target: 此示例包括一个密码以纯文本格式仅用于说明目的。

trans-unit.source: In a production application, connection strings that include passwords should be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 在生产应用程序，包括密码的连接字符串应需要加密。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Protecting Connection Information](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/protecting-connection-information.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护连接信息](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/protecting-connection-information.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data source view.
trans-unit.target: 数据源视图的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates a data source view object that is associated with the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 创建与数据源控件关联的数据源视图对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" />。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CreateDataSourceView%2A> method to return strongly typed data source view objects.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>类可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CreateDataSourceView%2A>方法以返回强类型化数据源视图对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data retrieval mode that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> control uses to fetch data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 控件获取数据所用的数据检索模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet" />值。

trans-unit.source: The data retrieval mode identifies how a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control retrieves data from the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 数据检索模式标识如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件从基础数据库中检索数据。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet> value, data is loaded into a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object and stored in memory on the server.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet>值，将数据加载到<xref:System.Data.DataSet>对象和存储在服务器上的内存。

trans-unit.source: This enables scenarios where user interface controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, offer sorting, filtering, and paging capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 这使得用户界面控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>，提供排序、 筛选和分页功能。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataReader> value, data is retrieved by a <xref:System.Data.IDataReader> object, which is a forward-only, read-only cursor.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataReader>值，通过检索数据<xref:System.Data.IDataReader>对象，它是只进、 只读游标。

trans-unit.source: The specific type of the <xref:System.Data.IDataReader> object depends on the NET data provider that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> uses, which is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 特定类型的<xref:System.Data.IDataReader>对象依赖于的 NET 数据提供程序，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>使用，由标识<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control uses the provider for Microsoft SQL Server, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and the data reader is a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> object.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件对于 Microsoft SQL Server，使用提供程序<xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>，并将数据读取器<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>对象。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.DataSourceChanged> event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> to rebind.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.DataSourceChanged>引发事件时，导致绑定到任何控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>重新绑定。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>属性存储视图状态中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataReader> value for a scenario with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control that requires no sorting, paging, nor filtering.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制转移到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataReader>有关带的方案值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>控件不需要排序、 分页和筛选。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode" /> property is not one of the values defined in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode" /> 属性不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode" /> 中定义的任何一个值。

trans-unit.source: Performs a delete operation using the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand" /> SQL string and any parameters that are in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand" /> SQL 字符串和 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters" /> 集合中的所有参数执行删除操作。

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the number of rows deleted from the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，该值表示从基础数据库中删除的行数。

trans-unit.source: Before the delete operation is performed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting> event.
trans-unit.target: 执行删除操作之前，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A>调用方法来引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理此事件，检查的参数的值并执行删除操作之前任何预处理。

trans-unit.source: After the operation completes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 在操作完成后，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A>调用方法来引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理此事件，检查任何返回值和错误代码并执行任何后续处理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> method is provided for programmatic access to the `Delete` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>方法提供以编程方式访问`Delete`方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is associated with a data-bound control, the data-bound control automatically calls the **Delete** method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件与数据绑定控件相关联，数据绑定控件将自动调用**删除**方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> method delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Delete%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>方法会委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Delete%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: To perform the operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> builds a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> text and any associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> values, and then executes the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> against the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>生成<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>对象使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A>文本和任何关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>值，并执行<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>对基础数据库。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> text to delete an order from the Northwind database.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A>文本从 Northwind 数据库中删除订单。

trans-unit.source: Initially, data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 最初，从订单表中检索数据并显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly declare the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> property and call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> method when using data-bound controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> (unlike other controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, which automatically populate the parameters and call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> method on a data source control).
trans-unit.target: 你必须显式声明<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>属性并调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>方法使用数据绑定控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>(不同于其他控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>，这两者自动填充参数和调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>上数据源控件的方法)。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.OnClick%2A> event is delegated to the private `OnDelete` event handler, which explicitly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.OnClick%2A>事件委托给私有`OnDelete`显式调用的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> cannot establish a connection with the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 无法与基础数据源建立连接。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SQL string that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> control uses to delete data from the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 控件从基础数据库删除数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

trans-unit.source: An SQL string that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> uses to delete data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 删除数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> represents an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A>表示 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，并由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A> 属性标识。
