trans-unit.source: If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the syntax of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化的查询或命令，该参数的语法也取决于正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the provider is the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which is the default provider for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> class, the syntax of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果该提供程序是<xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>，这是默认提供程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>类，该参数的语法是`'@parameterName'`。

trans-unit.source: However, if the provider is set to the <xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果提供程序设置为<xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType>，则参数的占位符为`'?'`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295).
trans-unit.target: 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the database supports stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A>属性可以是一个 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据库支持存储的过程。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.DeleteCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A>属性委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.DeleteCommand%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: For security purposes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> property is not stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 出于安全考虑，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A>属性不存储视图状态中。

trans-unit.source: Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability.
trans-unit.target: 因为它是可能的客户端的视图状态的内容进行解码，视图中将有关数据库结构的敏感信息的存储状态可能导致信息泄露漏洞。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> text to delete an order from the Northwind database Orders table.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A>文本从 Northwind 数据库 Orders 表中删除一个订单。

trans-unit.source: Data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 从订单表检索数据并将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> renders a **Delete** button automatically when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>呈现**删除**自动按钮时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when the **Delete** button is clicked, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当**删除**单击按钮时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动填充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>集合并调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Finally, because this code example deletes data, an event handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 最后，此代码示例将删除数据，因为事件处理程序添加尝试数据库备份到磁盘之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand" /> property is an SQL statement or the name of a stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand" /> 属性中的文本是 SQL 语句还是存储过程的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType.Text" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType.Text" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommandType%2A> property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.DeleteCommandType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommandType%2A>属性委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.DeleteCommandType%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a delete operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 完成删除操作后发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> event to examine the values of output parameters after a delete operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>删除操作完成后，若要检查的值的事件输出参数。

trans-unit.source: The output parameters are available from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object that is associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 输出参数均可用从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>与事件相关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand" /> property from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从与 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand" /> 控件相关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> 对象获取包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 属性所使用的参数的参数集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" /> that contains the parameters used by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" />，它包含 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand" /> 属性所使用的参数。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> property contains a parameterized SQL query, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection contains any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A>属性包含参数化的 SQL 查询，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>集合包含任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对应于 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符的对象。

trans-unit.source: Make sure that no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> controls in the data-bound control that you bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control have names that match any parameter names in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 请确保没有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>绑定到数据绑定控件中的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件具有与匹配中的所有参数名名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Parameters that have the same name as bound fields are excluded from the SQL command, and a "parameter was not supplied" error might result.
trans-unit.target: 可能会导致具有相同的名称，如绑定的字段不从 SQL 命令和"未提供参数"的错误的参数。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues> value, the parameters are created for both the old and new values of the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues>参数值，创建数据的旧和新值。

trans-unit.source: The parameters for the old values are named according to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 旧值的参数命名根据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection might be important.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于 ADO.NET 提供程序中的参数的顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>集合可能会很重要。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType> providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order in which the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType>提供程序将根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中出现的顺序集合中的参数相关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType> provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with the placeholder in the SQL query.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>提供程序，这是默认的 ADO.NET 提供程序为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件，通过使用 SQL 查询中的占位符匹配参数的名称来关联集合中的参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295).
trans-unit.target: 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> property retrieves the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.DeleteParameters%2A> property that is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>属性检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.DeleteParameters%2A>所包含的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting> event to validate parameter values before executing the query.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> text to delete an order from the Northwind database.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A>文本从 Northwind 数据库中删除订单。

trans-unit.source: Initially, data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 最初，从订单表中检索数据并显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly declare <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> property and call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> method when using data-bound controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> (unlike other controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, which automatically populate the parameters and call <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> on a data source control).
trans-unit.target: 你必须显式声明<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>属性并调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>方法使用数据绑定控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>(不同于其他控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>，这两者自动填充参数和调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>上数据源控件)。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.OnClick%2A> event is delegated to the private `OnDelete` event handler, which explicitly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.OnClick%2A>事件委托给私有`OnDelete`显式调用的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行删除操作前发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting> event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control performs the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>事件以执行特定于应用程序，若要验证的值的参数，或更改之前的参数值的附加初始化操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件将执行删除操作。

trans-unit.source: The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called.
trans-unit.target: 与基础数据源的连接未尚未打开时，会调用事件处理程序委托。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Cancel%2A> method on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object that is exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 因此，将无法取消该操作，直接通过调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Cancel%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>由公开的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可以通过设置来取消该数据库操作<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting> event that is raised before a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> operation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>之前，将引发的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Because this example deletes data from the Northwind database, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A> handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 因为此示例从 Northwind 数据库中，将删除数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A>添加处理程序，以尝试数据库备份到磁盘之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> control has data caching enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 控件是否启用数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if data caching is enabled for the data source control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为数据源控件启用数据缓存，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control supports data caching.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件支持数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: While data is cached, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 数据被缓存，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法从缓存而不是从基础数据库中检索数据。

trans-unit.source: When the cache expires, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again.
trans-unit.target: 在缓存过期，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法从基础数据库中，检索数据，然后再次缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control automatically caches data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.EnableCaching%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before retrieving a fresh set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件将自动缓存数据时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.EnableCaching%2A>属性设置为`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>属性设置为一个值大于 0，表示缓存将数据存储在检索之前的秒数新集合。

trans-unit.source: When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用的在 Microsoft Windows 身份验证的客户端模拟时，当第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。

trans-unit.source: If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。

trans-unit.source: The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data.
trans-unit.target: 不通过另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问数据检索的数据。

trans-unit.source: If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching.
trans-unit.target: 如果希望多个用户访问数据，并且你希望每个检索到的数据库的安全性配置验证的数据，不使用缓存。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, with data caching enabled.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中的 Northwind 数据库检索数据并将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件，启用数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.EnableCaching%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> is set to 20 seconds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.EnableCaching%2A>属性设置为`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>设置为 20 秒。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute> field by default, users of this page will see fresh data every 20 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute>字段默认情况下，此页的用户将看到刷新的数据每隔 20 秒。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.EnableCaching" /> property is set to <see langword="true" /> when caching is not supported by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.EnableCaching" /> 不支持缓存时，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a filtering expression that is applied when the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> 方法时应用的筛选表达式。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a filtering expression applied when data is retrieved using the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> 方法检索数据时应用的筛选表达式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property value is a format string expression (a string that is processed by the <xref:System.String.Format%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method) that uses the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> collection for any substitution parameters included in the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性值是一个格式字符串表达式 (string，由处理<xref:System.String.Format%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法)，它使用中的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>包括在字符串中任何替换参数的集合。

trans-unit.source: The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> property, because the filter expression is applied to the <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataView> object that is returned from executing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器表达式语法是相同的语法通过接受<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>属性，因为筛选器表达式应用于<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.DataView>从执行返回的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you add parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection, you can also include format string placeholders (for example, `"{0}")` in the expression to substitute for parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将参数添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合，您还可以包含格式字符串占位符 (例如，`"{0}")`中要替换参数值的表达式。

trans-unit.source: The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 根据中的参数的索引替换占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If an object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection is `null`, the object will be replaced by an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果中的某个对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合是`null`，该对象将替换为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can include parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以包含在参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数是字符串或字符类型，请将参数括在单引号。

trans-unit.source: Quotation marks are not required, if the parameter is a numeric type.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数是数值类型，则不需要，引号引起来。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders that are found in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合包含的参数，其计算结果中找到的占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control supports filtering data only when in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet> mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件支持筛选数据时，才在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataSet>模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> string and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Northwind 数据库中检索数据和筛选使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>字符串和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property is applied any time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method is executed to retrieve data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性应用任何时间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>执行方法中检索数据。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>包含一个筛选器参数，它包含在一个占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the filter parameter is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object that is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，筛选器参数是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>绑定到的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A> property set to `true`, any change in the selection for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control causes the page to post information back to the server and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A>属性设置为`true`，所选内容中的任何更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制会导致页发回发到服务器的信息和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件重新绑定到数据源使用新的筛选器来控制。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression" /> property was set and the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> is in <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataReader" /> mode.
trans-unit.target: 已设置 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression" /> 属性，且 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 处于 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataReader" /> 模式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a filter operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行筛选操作前发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering> event to perform validation operations on filter parameter values before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control performs a filter operation.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering>事件来验证对值执行操作筛选器参数之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件将执行筛选器操作。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceFilteringEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以取消<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法通过设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceFilteringEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: The event is raised only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 仅当引发该事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering?displayProperty=nameWithType> event delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Filtering?displayProperty=nameWithType> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Filtering?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of parameters that are associated with any parameter placeholders that are in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression" /> string.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression" /> 字符串中的任何参数占位符关联的参数的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" /> that contains a set of parameters associated with any parameter placeholders found in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" />，它包含与在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression" /> 属性中找到的任何参数占位符相关联的一组参数。

trans-unit.source: The parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection are associated with any parameters that are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合了与中指定任何参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The parameter placeholders that are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property are matched by order to parameter objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的参数占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性中的参数对象的顺序由匹配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> property retrieves the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> property that is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>属性检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A>所包含的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering> event to validate parameter values before executing the query.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering>事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Northwind 数据库中检索数据和筛选使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is applied anytime the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method is executed to retrieve data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>随时应用控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>执行方法中检索数据。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性包含一个筛选器参数，它包含在一个占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the filter parameter is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object that is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，筛选器参数是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>绑定到的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A> property set to `true`, any change in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> selection causes the page to post information back to the server and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A>属性设置为`true`的任何更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>的选择会导致页发回发到服务器的信息和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件重新绑定到的数据源控件新的筛选器。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory" /> object that is associated with the ADO.NET provider that is identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory" /> 属性所标识的 ADO.NET 提供程序相关联的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory" /> that represents the identified ADO.NET provider; otherwise, and instance of the <see cref="N:System.Data.SqlClient" />, if no provider is set.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示已标识的 ADO.NET 提供程序的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory" />；如果没有设置任何提供程序，则为 <see cref="N:System.Data.SqlClient" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory> property is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control to create the correct ADO.NET connection, command, and parameter objects when interacting with a database.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory>属性由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件与数据库交互时创建正确的 ADO.NET 连接、 命令和参数对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the view to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的视图的名称。

trans-unit.source: Because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> supports only one view, <c>viewName</c> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 由于 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 只支持一个视图，因此 <c>viewName</c> 被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Gets the named data source view that is associated with the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 获取与数据源控件关联的命名的数据源视图。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> named "Table" that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> 相关联的名为“Table”的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control supports only one data source view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件支持只有一个数据源视图。

trans-unit.source: As with all data source view objects, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object that is associated with the data source control defines its capabilities, performs all work that is necessary to retrieve data from the underlying database, and performs operations, such as sorting, inserting, deleting, and updating.
trans-unit.target: 与所有数据源视图对象一样，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>与数据源控件相关联的对象定义其功能、 执行的所有工作，需要从基础数据库中，检索数据并都执行操作，如排序，插入、 删除和更新。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewName" /> is <see langword="null" /> or something other than <c>Table</c>.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="viewName" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> 或 <c>Table</c> 以外的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of names representing the list of view objects that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取名称的集合，这些名称表示与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 控件关联的视图对象的列表。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> that contains the names of the views associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含视图名称的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，这些视图与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control supports only one view on its underlying data, named `"Table"`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件支持名为其基础数据上的只有一个视图`"Table"`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.GetViewNames%2A> method returns a single-element collection of this one view name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.GetViewNames%2A>方法返回一个视图同名的单个元素集合。

trans-unit.source: Performs an insert operation using the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand" /> SQL string and any parameters that are in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand" /> SQL 字符串和 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters" /> 集合中的所有参数执行插入操作。

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the number of rows inserted into the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，该值表示插入到基础数据库中的行数。

trans-unit.source: Before the insert operation is performed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting> event.
trans-unit.target: 执行插入操作之前，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A>调用方法来引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理此事件，检查的参数的值并执行任何预处理之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>操作。

trans-unit.source: To perform an insert operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object builds an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A> text and any associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> properties, and then executes the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object against the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行插入操作，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>对象生成<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>对象使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>文本和任何关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>属性，然后执行<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>对基础数据库对象。

trans-unit.source: After the operation completes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> event.
trans-unit.target: 在操作完成后，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>调用方法来引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理此事件，检查任何返回值和错误代码并执行任何后续处理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A> method is provided for programmatic access to the `Insert` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>方法提供以编程方式访问`Insert`方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is associated with a data-bound control, the data-bound control automatically calls the `Insert` method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件与数据绑定控件相关联，数据绑定控件将自动调用`Insert`方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A> method delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Insert%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>方法会委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Insert%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering> event to validate parameter values before executing the query.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering>事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control and a simple Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件和一个简单的 Web 窗体页。

trans-unit.source: The current data in the Data table is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 数据表中的当前数据显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can add new records by entering values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过输入中的值添加新记录<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件，，然后单击**插入**按钮。

trans-unit.source: When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 当**插入**单击按钮时，指定的值插入到数据库，然后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>进行刷新。

trans-unit.source: This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 该示例包括一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框和值插入到参数而无需验证，也是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting> event to validate parameter values before executing the query.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何通过使用代码而不标记访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> cannot establish a connection with the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 无法与基础数据源建立连接。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SQL string that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> control uses to insert data into the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 控件将数据插入基础数据库所用的 SQL 字符串。

trans-unit.source: An SQL string that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> uses to insert data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 插入数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A> represents either an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>表示 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，并由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A> 属性标识。

trans-unit.source: If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the provider is the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which is the default provider for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果该提供程序是<xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>，这是默认提供程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。

trans-unit.source: However, if the provider is set to the <xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果提供程序设置为<xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType>，则参数的占位符为`'?'`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295).
trans-unit.target: 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A> can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>可以 SQL 字符串或名称的存储过程，如果数据源支持存储的过程。

trans-unit.source: This property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: For security purposes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A> property is not stored is view state.
trans-unit.target: 出于安全考虑，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>不存储属性的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability.
trans-unit.target: 因为它是可能的客户端的视图状态的内容进行解码，视图中将有关数据库结构的敏感信息的存储状态可能导致信息泄露漏洞。

trans-unit.source: Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering> event to validate parameter values before executing the query.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering>事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control and a simple Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件和一个简单的 Web 窗体页。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to see details of a selected row into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and as a form to insert new records.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 检索数据并将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件以及如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件以查看详细信息到所选行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件和为窗体以插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: These examples show how to use declarative syntax for data access.
trans-unit.target: 这些示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何通过使用代码而不标记访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control and a simple Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件和一个简单的 Web 窗体页。

trans-unit.source: The current data in the Data table is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 数据表中的当前数据显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can add new records by entering values into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过输入值插入添加新记录<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件，，然后单击**插入**按钮。

trans-unit.source: When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 当**插入**单击按钮时，指定的值插入到数据库中，与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>刷新控件。

trans-unit.source: This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 该示例包括一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框和值插入到参数而无需验证，也是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting> event to validate parameter values before executing the query.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from SQL Server and display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to see details of a selected row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and as a form to insert new records.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从 SQL Server 检索数据并将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件以及如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件以查看详细信息中所选行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件和为窗体以插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the data is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, and the selected row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is also displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 最初，数据将显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制和所选的行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>也会显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> has the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> properties, which ensures that the selected row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与关联的一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>属性，确保所选的行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>是显示。

trans-unit.source: If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record.
trans-unit.target: 如果你单击自动生成**插入**按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用存储的过程以插入记录，并返回插入的行的主键。

trans-unit.source: If you insert a record, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> automatically populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection with values from the bound columns and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果插入一条记录，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>自动填充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合的值的绑定的列和调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> can infer the correct parameters from any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object and a parameter for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>可以推断出正确的参数从任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象和参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象时，则 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定使用语法。

trans-unit.source: In this example, an additional parameter is added in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A> event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A>事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。

trans-unit.source: Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A> event handler is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is called explicitly to refresh the data.
trans-unit.target: 最后，数据插入到数据库后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>调用事件处理程序来处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>显示事件，插入的行的主键的值与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件被显式调用，以刷新数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand" /> property is an SQL statement or the name of a stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand" /> 属性中的文本是 SQL 语句还是存储过程的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType.Text" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType.Text" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommandType%2A> property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommandType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommandType%2A>属性委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommandType%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from a Microsoft SQL Server database and display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库检索数据并将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to see details of a selected row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and as a form to insert new records.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件以查看详细信息中所选行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和为窗体以插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays a set of data and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> displays the details for a particular row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将显示一组数据和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>显示的特定行的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record.
trans-unit.target: 如果你单击自动生成**插入**按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用存储的过程以插入记录，并返回插入的行的主键。

trans-unit.source: The stored procedure name is set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A> property and identified as a stored procedure by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommandType%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType.StoredProcedure> value.
trans-unit.target: 在中设置的存储的过程名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>属性和标识为存储过程，通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommandType%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType.StoredProcedure>值。

trans-unit.source: After data is inserted into the database by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A> event handler is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is called explicitly to refresh the data.
trans-unit.target: 数据插入到数据库后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>调用事件处理程序来处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件被显式调用，以刷新数据。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an insert operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 完成插入操作后发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> event to examine the values of output parameters after an insert operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>完成插入操作后，若要检查的值的事件输出参数。

trans-unit.source: The output parameters are available from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object that is associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 输出参数均可用从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>与事件相关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to see details of a selected row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and as a form to insert new records.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 检索数据并将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件以及如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件以查看详细信息中所选行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和为窗体以插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何通过使用代码而不标记访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the data is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, and the selected row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is also displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 最初，数据将显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制和所选的行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>也会显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> has the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> properties, which ensures that the selected row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与关联的一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>属性，确保所选的行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>是显示。

trans-unit.source: If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record.
trans-unit.target: 如果你单击自动生成**插入**按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用存储的过程以插入记录，并返回插入的行的主键。

trans-unit.source: If you insert a record, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> automatically populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection with values from the bound columns and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果插入一条记录，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>自动填充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合的值的绑定的列和调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> can infer the correct parameters from any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object and a parameter for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>可以推断出正确的参数从任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象和参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象时，则 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定使用语法。

trans-unit.source: In this example, an additional parameter is added in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A> event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A>事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。

trans-unit.source: Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A> event handler is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is called explicitly to refresh the data.
trans-unit.target: 最后，数据插入到数据库后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>调用事件处理程序来处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件被显式调用，以刷新数据。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行插入操作前发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting> event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control performs the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>事件以执行特定于应用程序，若要验证的值的参数，或更改之前的参数值的附加初始化操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件将执行插入操作。

trans-unit.source: The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called.
trans-unit.target: 与基础数据源的连接未尚未打开时，会调用事件处理程序委托。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Cancel%2A> method on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object that is exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，将无法取消该操作，直接通过调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Cancel%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>由公开的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可以通过设置来取消该数据库操作<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand" /> property from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从与 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand" /> 控件相关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> 对象获取包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 属性所使用的参数的参数集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" /> that contains the parameters used by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" />，它包含 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand" /> 属性所使用的参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> property retrieves the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A> property that is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>属性检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A>所包含的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A> property contains a parameterized SQL query, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection contains any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>属性包含参数化的 SQL 查询，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合包含任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对应于 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符的对象。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection might be important.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于 ADO.NET 提供程序中的参数的顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合可能会很重要。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType> providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType>提供程序将根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中出现的顺序集合中的参数相关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType> provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>提供程序，这是默认的 ADO.NET 提供程序为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件中，将集合中的参数相关联的 SQL 查询中的占位符别名的参数的名称匹配。

trans-unit.source: For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295).
trans-unit.target: 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。

trans-unit.source: Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering> event to validate parameter values before executing the query.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering>事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control and a simple Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件和一个简单的 Web 窗体页。

trans-unit.source: The current data in the Data table is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 数据表中的当前数据显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can add new records by entering values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过输入中的值添加新记录<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件，，然后单击**插入**按钮。

trans-unit.source: When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 当**插入**单击按钮时，指定的值插入到数据库中，与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>刷新控件。

trans-unit.source: This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 该示例包括一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框和值插入到参数而无需验证，也是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting> event to validate parameter values before executing the query.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。
